descr: As a Business Analyst I am responisble for being the link between the developers and the stakeholders/business. I Review, analyze and evaluate business systems and user needs. Document requirements, define scope and objectives and formulate systems to parallel overall business strategies.
Responsible for the maintenance of the system as well as supporting further system development and testing.
Adminstrate and manage incoming credit applications regarding leasing and hire-purchase agreements.
Administrate incoming and outgoing agreements, invoices and other documents. Handle supplier payments and start of agreement etc.
